site_name: Land Bounded By Daniel Gardens & Samuel Street SE15 (Phase 8A (II)
description: Redevelopment of site by erection of part 4, part 5 and part 6 storey building comprising 44 dwellings [ 2 x four-bedroom houses, 11 x one-bedroom flats, 23 x two-bedroom flats and 8 x three-bedroom flats], together with associated car parking, landscaping and infrastructure works.
